name: UpdateOrderLineItem
description:
Update a specific order line item.

Use this tool to update details of a specific order line item in an e-commerce store. Useful for modifying existing order line items with new information or adjustments.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the store where the order was placed.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the order within the store. Required to specify which order is being updated.

value_schema.description: The id for the order in a store.

parameters.name: line_item_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the line item within an order in a store.

value_schema.description: The id for the line item of an order.

parameters.name: product_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product associated with the order line item.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product associated with the order line item.

parameters.name: product_variant_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the product variant associated with the order line item. This is required to specify the variant of the product being referenced.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier for the product variant associated with the order line item.

parameters.name: order_line_item_quantity
parameters.description: Specify the quantity of the order line item to be updated.

value_schema.description: The quantity of an order line item.

parameters.name: order_line_item_price
parameters.description: Specify the updated price for the order line item. This should be a numerical value reflecting the new cost of the item.

value_schema.description: The price of an order line item.

parameters.name: line_item_discount_amount
parameters.description: The total discount amount applied to this line item in the order. Provide as a numerical value.

value_schema.description: The total discount amount applied to this line item.
